Title: Where to Invest Your Time and Money for Growth
Description:
Today we hear from:

•      A son wanting advice on going back to work on the family farm

•      An Instagram follower wondering if he should work with multiple banks to avoid what’s happening with Silicon Valley Bank

•      A solopreneur wondering what he needs to know before he hires a team member

•      A small-business owner wondering where to spend his marketing budget for the most return on investment

•      A small-business owner wanting advice on if he should sell his $12 million business to go back to vocational ministry
